```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("setup.R")
PBS |>
  filter(ATC2 == "A10") |>
  select(Month, Concession, Type, Cost) |>
  summarise(TotalC = sum(Cost)) |>
  mutate(Cost = TotalC / 1e6) -> a10
```

## Time plots
\fontsize{10}{10}\sf

```{r}
a10 |>
  autoplot(Cost)
```
